DOC.brief_summary: This project adaptation trial , test efficacy evidence-based community wellness program , Enhance Wellness ( http : //www.projectenhance.org/enhancewellness.aspx ) , sample middle older-aged adult live multiple sclerosis , spinal cord injury , post-polio syndrome muscular dystrophy .
DOC.brief_title: Enhance Wellness Individuals With Long-Term Physical Disabilities
DOC.detailed_description: This quasi-experimental project , compare effect Enhance Wellness sample adult age 45 year old live long-term physical disability , two quasi-control group : sample adult without long-term disability participate Enhance Wellness , sample adult long-term disability participate Enhance Wellness . Outcomes collect pre-intervention post-intervention , approximately 6-months apart .
DOC.criteria: Multiple Sclerosis , Muscular Dystrophy , PostPolio Syndrome , Spinal Cord Injury diagnosis ( Group 1 3 ) Living King County , Washington ( Group 1 ) Ability read understand English Active suicidal ideation Requires use mechanical ventilator breathe speak
